code: export var myScrollTo=function myScrollTo(id){var element_to_scroll_to=document.getElementById(id);if(element_to_scroll_to!=null){element_to_scroll_to.scrollIntoView();}};export var myScrollToWithOffset=function myScrollToWithOffset(id,offset){var element_to_scroll_to=document.getElementById(id);if(element_to_scroll_to!=null&&id!=null){var y=element_to_scroll_to.getBoundingClientRect().top+window.pageYOffset+offset;window.scrollTo({top:y,behavior:'smooth'});}};
